a.detail: A tile labyrinth covers the floor
a.summary: A tile labyrinth covers the floor

c.detail: A chute falls into the corridor from above
c.summary: A chute falls into the corridor from above

details.history: The dungeon was created by a lawful evil wizard as a mine. Its creator was destroyed by a natural disaster, and the dungeon has lain empty for many years until recently.
details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, lamps or torches in most rooms)
details.temperature:
Very Hot (DC 10 Constitution save each hour
    or gain one level of exhaustion)

monster: Yuan-ti Pit Master (cr 5, motm 276, vgm 206) and 12 x Yuan-ti Pureblood (cr 1, mm 310); hard, 4200 xp
Treasure: 1400 cp, 20 ep; 19 sp; 15 sp; 17 sp; 11 cp; 16 cp; 15 sp; 12 ep; 12 cp; 20 cp; 6 pp; 17 cp; 11 cp

contents.inhabited: Yuan-ti Pit Master and 12 x Yuan-ti Pureblood
contents.summary: Yuan-ti Pit Master and 12 x Yuan-ti Pureblood

south.desc: Locked Iron Door (DC 20 to open, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)

detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled a diagram of a mechanical trap on the east wall, and a corpse lies in front of an open chest in the east side of the room

north.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

detail.room_features: A narrow shaft descends from the room into a magical cyst below, and someone has scrawled "Aegeand was here" on the north wall

north.desc: Locked Strong Wooden Door (DC 20 to open, DC 20 to break; 20 hp)

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 15 to find) Locked Strong Wooden Chest (DC 15 to unlock, DC 25 to break; 20 hp)

14000 gp, 2300 pp, a coral cup inlaid with a filigree of platinum (250 gp), a lacquered wooden chalice inlaid with ornate gold scrollwork (250 gp), a set of a fine steel rapier and dagger engraved with draconic scales (250 gp), a silver mask engraved with draconic scales (250 gp), Potion of Invisibility (very rare, dmg 188), Potion of Speed (very rare, dmg 188)
trap:
Lightning Turret: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    initiative +4, 1 attack per round, affects all targets in a 40 ft. line, DC 15 save or take 10d10 lightning damage

north.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)
Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

west.desc: Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

settings.name: The Lost Dungeon of the Demon Baron

wandering_monsters.1: 3 x Young Kruthik (cr 1/8, motm 168, mtf 211) and 7 x Adult Kruthik (cr 2, motm 169, mtf 212); medium, 3225 xp; wandering senselessly
wandering_monsters.2: Young Blue Dragon (cr 9, mm 91) and 5 x Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186); easy, 5500 xp; wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.3: 12 x Vargouille (cr 1, motm 251, vgm 195); medium, 2400 xp; gathering bones for a necromancer
wandering_monsters.4: 2 x Tlincalli (cr 5, motm 243, vgm 193); easy, 3600 xp; scouting from another part of the dungeon
wandering_monsters.5: Yuan-ti Mind Whisperer (cr 4, motm 274, vgm 204) and 9 x Yuan-ti Pureblood (cr 1, mm 310); medium, 2900 xp; investigating a strange noise
wandering_monsters.6: Flind (cr 9, motm 127, vgm 153) and 6 x Gnoll (cr 1/2, mm 163); easy, 5600 xp; trying to avoid notice
